newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil industrial production up 0.5 pct in June.
newsitem.headline: Brazil industrial production up 0.5 pct in June.

text.p: Brazil's National Statistics Institute (IBGE) said industrial production rose 0.5 percent in June from the previous month, a local news agency said.
The figure indicates a recovery in industrial output following May's 0.6 percent decline, according to Invest News.
The IBGE described the rise in June as moderate, saying the improvement was more evident when comparing the second quarter of 1996 with the first quarter.
Full industrial output figures for June are scheduled to be released later today.
-- Simona de Logu, Rio de Janeiro Newsroom 5521 507 4151
